requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Dualcore, AMD X2 Dualcore with 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 280, AMD Radeon HD 4870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel i5-series Quadcore, AMD Ryzen-series Quadcore with 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, AMD Radeon HD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
